Subject: HOT ROD'S NEW BODY
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: richard f allen <rfa007@...>

::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod came out of the ship. He was in a new body.
It was a replica of his old Autobot body.
Except this one was scaled down to Maximal size, its lasers had been
replaced with plasma charges, optic laser, and two rocket launchers have
been installed, there was now a on board computer, and a Maximal symbol
where the Autobot symbol once was.
"Well lets give it a try. Vehical mode." Hot Rod transformes to the
futuristic sports car he once was, and drives off towards the
Cybertronian Fire.
